member.name: T:Microsoft.Windows.ApplicationModel.WindowsAppRuntime.DeploymentManager
member.summary: Provides access to deployment information for the Windows App SDK runtime.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.ApplicationModel.WindowsAppRuntime.DeploymentManager.GetStatus
member.summary: Returns the current deployment status of the Windows App SDK runtime that is currently loaded. Use this method to identify if there is work required to install Windows App SDK runtime packages before the current app can use Windows App SDK features.
member.returns: An object that provides deployment status and error information for the Windows App SDK runtime referenced by the current package.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.ApplicationModel.WindowsAppRuntime.DeploymentManager.Initialize
member.summary: Checks the status of the Windows App SDK runtime referenced by the current package and attempts to register any missing packages that can be registered.
member.returns: An object that provides deployment status and error information for the Windows App SDK runtime referenced by the current package.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Windows.ApplicationModel.WindowsAppRuntime.DeploymentResult
member.summary: Provides deployment status and error information for the Windows App SDK runtime referenced by the current package.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.ApplicationModel.WindowsAppRuntime.DeploymentResult.#ctor(Microsoft.Windows.ApplicationModel.WindowsAppRuntime.DeploymentStatus,Windows.Foundation.HResult)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the DeploymentResult class.
member.param: The deployment status of the Windows App SDK runtime that is currently loaded.
The first encountered error if there was an error initializing the Windows App SDK runtime or getting the status of the runtime.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.ApplicationModel.WindowsAppRuntime.DeploymentResult.ExtendedError
member.summary: Gets the first encountered error if there was an error initializing the Windows App SDK runtime or getting the status of the runtime.
member.returns: The first encountered error if there was an error initializing the Windows App SDK runtime or getting the status of the runtime. If there is no error, this property returns S_OK.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.ApplicationModel.WindowsAppRuntime.DeploymentResult.Status
member.summary: Gets the deployment status of the Windows App SDK runtime that is currently loaded.
member.returns: The deployment status of the Windows App SDK runtime that is currently loaded.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Windows.ApplicationModel.WindowsAppRuntime.DeploymentStatus
member.summary: Represents the deployment status of the Windows App SDK runtime that is currently loaded.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Windows.ApplicationModel.WindowsAppRuntime.DeploymentStatus.Ok
member.summary: The Windows App SDK runtime is in a good deployment state.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Windows.ApplicationModel.WindowsAppRuntime.DeploymentStatus.PackageInstallFailed
member.summary: The installation of a package for the Windows App SDK runtime failed.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Windows.ApplicationModel.WindowsAppRuntime.DeploymentStatus.PackageInstallRequired
member.summary: A package install is required in order for the Windows App SDK runtime to be in a good deployment state.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Windows.ApplicationModel.WindowsAppRuntime.DeploymentStatus.Unknown
member.summary: The Windows App SDK runtime is in an unknown deployment state.
